DailyReport.title: DailyReport
DailyReport.description: Represents a comprehensive daily financial report.

accountSnapshots.description: A snapshot of account balances at the time of the report.

totalAccountBalance.description: Sum of all kas account balances at the time of report generation.

openingBalanceRotation.description: The final liability/asset from the previous day's report.

capitalAdditionToday.description: Total capital added via 'Tambah Modal' today.

paymentToPartyB.description: Manual input for payment made from party A to party B.

manualSpending.description: Manual input for capital expenditure (e.g., buying stock).

finalLiabilityForNextDay.description: The final liability value to be carried over to the next day.

assetAccessories.description: Manual input for the value of accessory assets.

assetSIMCards.description: Manual input for the value of SIM card assets.

assetVouchers.description: Manual input for the value of voucher assets.

cashInDrawer.description: Manual input for cash in the small drawer.

cashInSafe.description: Manual input for cash in the safe.

DailyReportSettings.title: DailyReportSettings
DailyReportSettings.description: Stores settings and carry-over values for the daily report.

lastFinalLiability.description: The final liability from the last generated report, to be used as the opening balance for the next.

CurrentShiftStatus.title: CurrentShiftStatus
CurrentShiftStatus.description: Represents the currently active shift status, shared across all devices.

ShiftReconciliation.title: ShiftReconciliation
ShiftReconciliation.description: Represents the data recorded at the end of an operator's shift to reconcile cash.

initialCapital.description: The initial cash amount at the start of the shift.

appCashIn.description: Total cash received according to this web app's transactions during the shift.

voucherCashIn.description: Total cash received from the external voucher POS system, entered manually.

expectedTotalCash.description: The sum of initialCapital, appCashIn, and voucherCashIn.

actualPhysicalCash.description: The actual physical cash amount counted in the drawer.

difference.description: The difference between expectedTotalCash and actualPhysicalCash.

notes.description: Optional notes about the reconciliation, e.g., explaining a difference.

PPOBWifi.title: PPOBWifi
PPOBWifi.description: Represents a Wifi bill payment transaction.

totalAmount.description: The total amount paid by the customer (harga jual).

cashback.description: Cashback received from the PPOB provider.

PPOBPricing.title: PPOBPricing
PPOBPricing.description: Stores the entire PPOB pricing structure in a single document.

data.description: Contains the nested pricing data for all PPOB services.

motivationQuote.description: The daily motivational quote displayed on the home screen.

motivationAuthor.description: The author of the daily motivational quote.

KasAccount.title: KasAccount
KasAccount.description: Represents a cash account within the BrimoUI application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the KasAccount entity.

label.description: The display name of the cash account (e.g., Tunai, Bank).

type.description: The type of the cash account (e.g., Tunai, Bank).

balance.description: The current balance of the cash account.

minimumBalance.description: The minimum balance threshold for the account.

color.description: The background color associated with the account for UI rendering.

settlementDestinationAccountId.description: For merchant accounts, the ID of the KasAccount where settled funds are transferred.

iconUrl.description: URL for the icon of the account, especially for PPOB providers.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Transaction entity.

kasAccountId.description: Reference to the KasAccount where this transaction is recorded.

type.description: The type of transaction (e.g., credit, debit).

name.description: A descriptive name for the transaction.

account.description: The counterparty account or description for the transaction.

balanceBefore.description: The balance of the kas account before the transaction.

balanceAfter.description: The balance of the kas account after the transaction.

sourceKasAccountId.description: For transfers, the ID of the source KasAccount.

destinationKasAccountId.description: For transfers, the ID of the destination KasAccount.

deviceName.description: The name of the device that created the transaction.

category.description: A category to group transactions, e.g., 'transfer', 'operational', 'capital', 'customer_transfer_debit', 'customer_payment', 'ppob_bpjs'.

auditId.description: The ID of the corresponding audit log document in a root collection (e.g., customerTransfers).

InternalTransfer.title: InternalTransfer
InternalTransfer.description: Represents an internal balance transfer between two KasAccounts.

CustomerTransfer.title: CustomerTransfer
CustomerTransfer.description: Represents a transfer service transaction for a customer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CustomerTransfer transaction.

sourceKasAccountId.description: The ID of the internal KasAccount used to send the money.

destinationBankName.description: The name of the customer's destination bank.

destinationAccountName.description: The name of the recipient account holder.

transferAmount.description: The principal amount transferred to the customer's destination.

bankAdminFee.description: The fee charged by the bank for the transfer.

serviceFee.description: The service fee charged to the customer (our profit).

paymentMethod.description: How the customer paid for the service.

paymentToKasTunaiAmount.description: Portion of the payment made in cash.

paymentToKasTransferAccountId.description: ID of the KasAccount that received the transfer portion of the payment.

paymentToKasTransferAmount.description: Portion of the payment made via transfer.

deviceName.description: The name of the device that processed the transaction.

CustomerWithdrawal.title: CustomerWithdrawal
CustomerWithdrawal.description: Represents a cash withdrawal service transaction for a customer.

CustomerTopUp.title: CustomerTopUp
CustomerTopUp.description: Represents an E-Wallet top-up service transaction for a customer.

CustomerEmoneyTopUp.title: CustomerEmoneyTopUp
CustomerEmoneyTopUp.description: Represents an E-Money top-up service transaction for a customer.

CustomerVAPayment.title: CustomerVAPayment
CustomerVAPayment.description: Represents a Virtual Account (VA) payment service transaction for a customer.

PPOBTransaction.title: PPOBTransaction
PPOBTransaction.description: Represents a PPOB (Payment Point Online Bank) transaction for auditing profit and loss.

serviceName.description: The name of the PPOB service (e.g., Token Listrik, Pulsa, BPJS).

destination.description: The target of the transaction, e.g., phone number, customer ID, token number.

description.description: A brief description of the transaction.

costPrice.description: The capital or modal price for the service.

sellingPrice.description: The final price paid by the customer.

deviceName.description: The name of the device that processed the transaction.

PPOBPlnPostpaid.title: PPOBPlnPostpaid
PPOBPlnPostpaid.description: Represents a PLN Postpaid bill payment transaction.

totalAmount.description: The total amount paid by the customer (harga jual).

cashback.description: Cashback received from the PPOB provider.

PPOBPdam.title: PPOBPdam
PPOBPdam.description: Represents a PDAM bill payment transaction.

totalAmount.description: The total amount paid by the customer (harga jual).

cashback.description: Cashback received from the PPOB provider.

PPOBBpjs.title: PPOBBpjs
PPOBBpjs.description: Represents a BPJS bill payment transaction.

totalAmount.description: The total amount paid by the customer (harga jual).

cashback.description: Cashback received from the PPOB provider.

EDCService.title: EDCService
EDCService.description: Represents a transaction for lending an EDC machine service.

Settlement.title: Settlement
Settlement.description: Represents a settlement transaction from a merchant account.

CustomerKJPWithdrawal.title: CustomerKJPWithdrawal
CustomerKJPWithdrawal.description: Represents a KJP cash withdrawal service transaction.

/dailyReports/{reportId}.description: Stores generated comprehensive daily financial reports.

/appConfig/dailyReportSettings.description: Stores settings and carry-over values for the daily report, like the last final liability.

/appConfig/currentShiftStatus.description: Stores the currently active shift status, shared across all devices.

/shiftReconciliations/{reconciliationId}.description: Stores the history of end-of-shift cash reconciliations.

/appConfig/motivation.description: Stores global app settings like the daily motivation quote.

/appConfig/ppobPricing.description: Stores the entire PPOB pricing structure in a single document.

/kasAccounts/{kasAccountId}.description: Stores all cash accounts in a global, public collection. All users (anonymous or authenticated) can read and write to this collection.

/kasAccounts/{kasAccountId}/transactions.description: Stores transaction history for each cash account in a global, public subcollection. All users can read and write transactions for any account.

/internalTransfers/{internalTransferId}.description: Stores a log of all internal balance transfers between KasAccounts for auditing.

/customerTransfers/{customerTransferId}.description: Stores a log of all customer transfer service transactions for auditing and business intelligence.

/customerWithdrawals/{customerWithdrawal.description: Stores a log of all customer cash withdrawal service transactions for auditing.

/customerTopUps/{customerTopUpId}.description: Stores a log of all customer e-wallet top-up transactions for auditing.

/customerEmoneyTopUps/{emoneyTopUpId}.description: Stores a log of all customer e-money top-up transactions for auditing.

/customerVAPayments/{vaPaymentId}.description: Stores a log of all customer Virtual Account payment transactions for auditing and business intelligence.

/ppobTransactions/{ppobTransactionId}.description: Stores a log of all PPOB service transactions for auditing profit and loss.

/ppobPlnPostpaid/{ppobPlnPostpaidId}.description: Stores a log of all PLN Postpaid bill payment transactions.

/ppobPdam/{ppobPdamId}.description: Stores a log of all PDAM bill payment transactions.

/ppobBpjs/{ppobBpjsId}.description: Stores a log of all BPJS bill payment transactions.

/ppobWifi/{ppobWifiId}.description: Stores a log of all Wifi bill payment transactions.

/edcServices/{edcServiceId}.description: Stores a log of all EDC rental service transactions for auditing profit and loss.

/settlements/{settlementId}.description: Stores a log of all merchant settlement transactions for auditing.

/customerKJPWithdrawals/{kjpWithdrawalId.description: Stores a log of all KJP withdrawal service transactions for auditing.
